website_summaries.verdict: A top ASUS motherboard choice with advanced protection features to keep the board safe during use.
pros: Strong, durable metal and plastic bracing around PCIe components like the graphic card(s)
High-quality audio is a good substitute for a dedicated audio card or interface
cons: Motherboard tends to boot up slowly at times when the computer is first turned on

customer_reviews.title: R5 1600x @4ghz; G.Skill kit at 3200mhz 14-14-14-34
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a Ryzen 1600x. Successfully overclocked to 4ghz with G.skill ram operating at 3200mhz (14-14-14-34). Great board. Loved being able to update the bios over LAN. There is some anomaly with the TPU profile that impacted my initial attempt at a stable overclock. Set it to TPU II in the bios and now it's PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Awesome Board from Asus
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing Board! It is fast! it has extremely technical or simple Bios that can do amazing things as you would expect from ASUS. You also have a really cool color option with the STRIX led AURA options. You have a lot of fan headers, 3.0 USB headers although I wish there were more USB 2.0 headers for more Corsiar links but I found the option with the NZXT Internal USB Hub Controller, Black (AC-IUSBH-M1) Using a Samsung 960 Pro 500 GB PCIe NVMe hard drive Windows 10 booted from press of the button to Windows completely booted up a shocking 8 seconds flat!
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Great price and gorgeous motherboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful motherboard and a great price for what you get. This is my first computer build. Paired mine with a Ryzen 5 1600 and ddr4 3000 Trident RGB. The asus aura software is super user friendly and have had no issues with the motherboard. The included user manual is super useful when installing components and to get you familiar with this beast. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazon buy used is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Board was dead on arrival no post at all that’s where this is the worst. Ok on to the other problems amazons buy used deal is horrible. Got near nothing with the board but a cd and some zip ties no SATA cables or sli bridge like you see in pictures not even a manual. On top of all that there was thermal paste all over the board on the IO cover all over ram slots horrible experience I’m pretty mad right now to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: ... the years and they usually have some of the best models out there at various price points
customer_reviews.text: I've had lots of Asus boards over the years and they usually have some of the best models out there at various price points. This one is no exception. Not much of a gamer or overclocker, but all the tools are there when you're ready. The LED lighting has unlimited flexibility with the AURA software and is bound to be a case modder's best friend. Onboard audio is very listenable. Maybe not audiophile quality but more than good enough for movies and TV. If you're wanting a $200 board for your AMD Ryzen, this one deserves a look. I've been running mine for about a month now and have no issues whatsoever. Rock solid stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Used, Amazon certified, SAVE$$$
customer_reviews.text: This MB kicks butt and full of basic features of your a basic gamer. Just remember, what are your needs and wants for your build, this good for what I needed, why pay extra for the bells and whistles but they sure are nice. It's got the RGB lights and all that, nice solders, solid looking components, parts easy to see what circuits to what is you need to for some reason. ASUS best customer service unlike gigadike has become today. Asus the only way to play.
customer_reviews.author: Mark simmons

customer_reviews.title: These rock and are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Built two computers with my kids for xmas with these boards. Excellent quality. Excellent instructions (first two builds) and this made it SUPER EASY. These boards were probably overkill for my needs, but look awesome and work very well. Makes my 4 year old computer look like total crap. If I could do it again, I would buy a board with only one graphics card slot and save money for my families needs. But good to know we have lot of improvement capability. Will stick with ASUS motherboards because instructions were so awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great motherboard!
customer_reviews.text: This motherboard is gorgeous! I decided to spend the extra money on this instead of 16gb of RAM (8gb is still plenty for simple gaming) and am very happy with the trade-off. The rgb looks great and the power delivery is wonderful so far. I'd recommend buying this motherboard over any other am4 motherboard simply for looks and the fact that it still has am3 cooler support built in (similar to the crosshair vi), unless you are strictly going for a budget build.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb0985

customer_reviews.title: Install the software from the disk before trying to update to the most recent version of any software.
customer_reviews.text: It has been five months and the board is still running smoothly. The only issue I had initially was trying to download the most recent app versions from the website for everything that came on the disk. I was unable to install one of them that way, but it installed fine from the disk, and updated to the newest version. I am using an AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Processor with the board and I am quite happy. disclosure statement: "I am receiving points in the ROG Elite Rewards program for my review", but it has not affected my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because asis dropped the ball on aura sync and ai suite to work with windows 10 most recent release. Other than that y amzing board. Please note you need to update bios to over clock. When i first tried and switched from auto to manual all other settings were grayed out and could not OC. Once bios was updated issue was fixed. I wad moderate went from 3.0 to 3.4 on stock settings.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this board more than the more expensive Gigabyte AX-GA Gaming K7 board. Only draw back are the LED headers are a bit older model, hope the new version of this board works as well. Easy to install CPU / Heatsink and Fan. I have not tried a water cooling block yet on this board.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Originally was looking at the STRIX B350 MB but Amazon had a great sale on this around Black Friday. Works great with my Ryzen 7 1800x and have it configured to dual boot into multiple OS’s.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Guy

customer_reviews.title: No major issues yet, a couple problems with RAM ...
customer_reviews.text: No major issues yet, a couple problems with RAM speeds...but I'm trying to determine if this is user error before pointing a finger. Major video coming up. We all need this in top top shape to stream and edit all of this. Hopefully it can handle it. Keep an eye out early September.
customer_reviews.author: OneThirtySeven

customer_reviews.title: Good motherboard with RGB control
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here, other than if you're going to be using a ryzen 3000 generation processor, you may want to shoot for the x570 or something else that's slightly newer, because it takes a little bit of effort to get it to work with this motherboard, but it can be done. Just know that going in if you're going to buy it, however since the x570 is the same price as this I don't see why you wouldn't just go for newer.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Cook

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: Bought this motherboard for my first PC build and I think it's perfect for the mid-range build I was going for. It's a powerful motherboard without all the RGB's flashing everywhere. It has one RGB lighting on the upper left corner but you can turn it off. The ease of use is great as well, connected everything that I needed to help build my PC. Can never go wrong with the ROG series if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Duc

customer_reviews.title: A good motherboard for Ryzen.
customer_reviews.text: The motherboard works super well for two way SLI. My only complaint is the Aura Sync. Across it and my Ram sticks, they just don't work well. I'm not sure if there is a new update on the way but there is always some sort of issue with Aura and it prevents certain games from opening as strange as that sounds. So by disabling Aura after you have your lights all setup, you can continue on just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: great board, not sure if any motherboards support them ...
customer_reviews.text: great board, not sure if any motherboards support them but would of liked to have seen adressable LED support on the two rgb headers. Installed board, flashed bios from within bios over internet, set DOCP (with ram that isn't on AMD's QVL) and works solid. Just make sure you install windows fresh with the most recent image, had some freezing issues using an older image that were resolved by making a new windows install USB and reinstalling.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Akins

customer_reviews.title: Installed and booted in a breeze. OC'd CPU and ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed and booted in a breeze. OC'd CPU and Memory automatically with just a bios configuration. Seems well constructed. I personally could deal with no pizzazz of a light show and just status LEDs / dark case. Been using ASUS / ROG motherboards for years. As with any most motherboard wish they could add a second Ethernet Port / LAN for a duel connection.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: 60a IR Power Stages - 6 Phase
customer_reviews.text: At the original MSRP, this board is a 4 star due to lacking buttons and the post code. Since I bought it for $120, the same amount I bought the Strix b350, I must give it a 5 star. The vrm is really strong at 60a. I love the fact you can set your vcore manually or offset. It even has an external clock gen so you can do bclk overclocking. All in all, a great board that's super easy to overclock with.
customer_reviews.author: BlackJack

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Board looks good, and functions well. It's just missing some features that other boards in this price range have. No post code Leds are a big missing feature. There is only one usb 2.0 header on the board. I ended up having to buy a splitter. The one thing I love about it is, it was super easy to update the bios via the internet without a thumb drive.
customer_reviews.author: jrpoelow

customer_reviews.title: SUS ROG Strix X370-F GAMING AMD Ryzen AM4 DDR4
customer_reviews.text: Love my Asus Rog Strix B350-f Gaming Mobo, paired it with a Ryzen 7 1800X, many say you may need a older CPU to update the bios, so i didnt chance it and put in my Ryzen 5 1500X first to update bios, but i didnt even thing i need to do the i could of just slapped the 1800X and take it from there the box does say AMD Ryzen Desktop 2000 READY
customer_reviews.author: Rom3

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy asus again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this motherboard because asus is a prestigious brand, but I realized that my disappointment began to fail and that no one wants to replace the defective item because I am not from the United States and I can not do anything, I have been scammed, I will never buy anything again asus Your customer service and your warranty did not help.
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Some memory compatibily issues
customer_reviews.text: Great board, you will have, as with most 1st generation ryzen boards, memory compatibility issues, but outside of that its a great board with a lot of features. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Machin

customer_reviews.title: Update BIOS with Ryzen 2400G
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this motherboard. It's beautiful and the bios is super easy to navigate and update. Speaking of that though if you plan on purchasing the Ryzen 5 2400g with Vega 11 graphics be sure to use someone elses regular processor or whatever you need to do to update the bios as its not compatible straight out of the box. Other than that its fantastic and it was super easy to fix the issue. I also love the fact that the different led lights up according to an issue so it makes it easy to figure out any problems. Good thing is I haven't had any. Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Redd

customer_reviews.title: Great board for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy asus boards and generally get the b450-f. This feel just the same and I have always enjoyed ASUS. I run ryzen 5 3rd gen and have no issues (now).
customer_reviews.author: BlakeH

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MOBO
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME MOBO! But if you are installing windows 10 make sure you update to bios to the latest version or you are going to run into a bunch of problems installing windows.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Great product and motherboard.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need. The M.2 SSD slot on the motherboard is a nice addition, not to mention the angled SATA ports on the side. You can feel the quality of this board versus other boards on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a box
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate! This is the best gaming pc motherboard you can buy for the chipset! I love mine, it was like christmas in July when i recieved mine, I highly recommend this board with the ryzen 7 2800x 8core 16 thread processor
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this board! fast and good... sounds good with good headphones too. looks awesome! couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Best Price! Best Vender!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and excellent quality. I would totally buy again. Every seems to check out so far. Great vender.
customer_reviews.author: Jen mahob

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, looks very sleek. The light on the board is rather bright but I like it to be honest. Make sure your case comes with mobo mounting screws as this doesn't come with any, not even spares
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Erb

customer_reviews.title: RGB doesn't work, but thats okay for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this motherboard for the RGB, I bought it for its true features. I am actually very happy the RGB doesn't work, but for some people that would be a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly on first try. Has a lot of functionalities from the Crosshair VI without being too expensive. Would recommend to install latest BIOS before installing any SO just to avoid any overclocking headache. Paired with: Ryzen 1700X 3.9 @ 1.375v Noctua UH12 AM4 (perfect fit) Corsair Vengeance 16gb 3000mhz (2933mhz as supported by Ryzen) Samsung 960 EVO Asus GTX1070 Asus: Would suggest the inclusion of a protective seal for the box, just to avoid the sensation of being opened, used or returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ryzen Motherboard
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a non working B350 mobo. I am so glad I upgraded. While the VRM heatsinks could be better I have had 0 problems with this board. It is both functional and attractive. I am writing this review to receive points in the ROG Rewards Program."
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: only concerns are powered usb 3 hubs connected to back ports sometimes flake out, and could use 1 or 2 more usb 2 headers (for aio cooling and card readers)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rollheiser

customer_reviews.title: My opinion dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I tried to game using it the dam thing would crash on me.... Loved some of the features but had to send it back so to the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great board with an even better price
customer_reviews.text: I literally can't speak highly enough of this motherboard. If you consider the price of this board compared against the features that it has it's an absolute no-brainer. If you just bought your brand new ryzen cpu, this is the board to go with it. M.2 support, great overclocking, subtle rgb illumination, and it also looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas p.

customer_reviews.title: The board itself is very good but the software that comes with it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is very good but the software that comes with it is very buggy and nonfunctional. ASUS is basically unable to get any of the software to work and every release just makes things worse.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Sieczkarski

customer_reviews.title: Used was just like brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board used to save $70 and it was brand new! Came with box all manuals stickers, sli bridge everything even had the smell. It posted and has now been working for the past 3 weeks very pleased
customer_reviews.author: luis hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Used for gaming and streaming
customer_reviews.text: Very nice motherboard. Recently got into pc gaming and was looking to upgrade my old motherboard to one that can handle games better! I never downloaded the RGB app but if you dont keep it mind the LED will stay lit even when powered off
customer_reviews.author: Randall Carter

customer_reviews.title: OK the product i believe works, but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: OK the product i believe works, but it is picky about the Ram you put into it the Corsair LPX 32 2x16gig Dram 3000MHz C15 memory kit . Make sure you go to the motherbaords website look up the right Ram the 3000MHz doesn't works well with this Motherbaord. I bought
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Never worked.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these motherboards, one at a time. The second one was purchased because the first one who would show power on, but would never start. The second one did the same thing. Both were returned as defective. Discouraging!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene C Chase Jr

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best X370 board out there. Got it for $129.99. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyBuilt4CubanLinx

customer_reviews.title: Great MoBo
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this board, besides no wi-fi? Lol Haven't had an issue, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hartman

customer_reviews.title: son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought for y son and he used it to build a great computer
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Happy/ not so happy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my item came to me defective. Was very disappointed due to I was building my tower from scratch. Now I have to wait till they are in stock again. Awesome price though.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: March 28th update
customer_reviews.text: This motherboard holds great promise of overclocking my Ryzen 1600X to 3.8 GHZ on all cores. I went with this board over the B350 because it offered more power phases ( 8+2) . In theory more power phases mean a cleaner power source to the processor. Update: March 28,2018. Aura RGB software not installing. I discovered how to turn it off in the BIOS so for now I can’t use the feature. It’s still a great board though. I am happy again with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Late Night Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really great board, has everything i need for my custom build and then some!
customer_reviews.author: brian m.

customer_reviews.title: This product can feel ROG sensibility properly.
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the ASUS AURA Sync properly. This X370-F can be used to decorate beautifully with NZXT AER FAN and G.SKILL.
customer_reviews.author: Koo_C

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at end of 2017. Using it since then, used for day to day use and gaming. Never had a single issue with it. Very good product for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, temperatures are low and it has just so many features
customer_reviews.author: Wizard of GAP

customer_reviews.title: Help bios not adecuated for ryzen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mother board and a ryzen 7. And i doesnt turn on the bios of the mother board is not adecuated for it. I also tried with a ryzen 3 any form to make it work?
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Came with an SLI bridge
customer_reviews.text: Has ALLOT of fan plugins and had an sli bridge. Looks very sleek although this is my first rog mobo it's the nicest mobo I've paid for
customer_reviews.author: Zane Patteson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I bought it on sale for $139 and could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: jeff harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I've had on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was on sale $70 off! Couldn't pass it up. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: jason stowers

customer_reviews.title: Doa
customer_reviews.text: First one was dead on arrival. Hopefully the replacement will work.
customer_reviews.author: casey chaves

customer_reviews.title: Looks good feels good quality and works great but it came ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good feels good quality and works great but it came missing the m.2 stand offs and was already opened
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Tarpy

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great motherboard and got it new on sale for $120 yeah what a steal
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent motherboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great motherboard, just remember that high end ryzen processors do not have graphics built in.
customer_reviews.author: oliverhbailey

customer_reviews.title: best amd looking motherboard
customer_reviews.text: easily overclocked my ram to 3466mhz and ryzen 1700 to 3.8 stable.
customer_reviews.author: SMIKE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Simple to setup BIOS once you are used to the layout.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: work great! huge update from my last MSI motherboard and the bios work really good
customer_reviews.author: Shnayder.mail

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: This board is a beast! Great Audio. Supports NVME M.2. Boots fast. Better VRM's then other board partners. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the motherboard and the box was smashed a little bit. but motherboard is ok, very good
customer_reviews.author: Jang Hwan Hyeok

customer_reviews.title: Runs fast and smoothly. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: My son built his own computer and chose this motherboard to use in it. I purchased it for him and he paid me back. (I have Prime!). Anyway, the computer is built and running great. So far there have been no issues. The computer boots quickly and runs fast and smoothly. Since it has only been a couple of weeks, I can't speak for the longevity and durability of this item so I removed a star for now. If all is well in six months, I will rerate to 5. If it isn't, you'll know that too. Fo now, this appears to be a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PattyTTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow BIOS. Not a problem!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Bios is the BEST. I have not had a single issue concerning this MOBO.
customer_reviews.author: Knotthead89

customer_reviews.title: Reserved Memory Issue
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty... I was getting the 'reserved memory' as a few others were. Two sticks gskill trident rgb 3200 16gb 2x8. Bios only seeing one stick in any config of the Dimms. Windows 10 x64 saw 16gb but 8.1g was always reserved. Tried all of the different fixes Google had to offer with no luck. Too much of a headache. Returning and going with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT boot with Ryzen processors
customer_reviews.text: Getting the BIOS in this motherboard to even post is a monumental task. I have a Ryzen 7 1800 and I simply could NOT get this motherboard to work. Forums online advise the use of an A-series processor to get this board started, then upgrade BIOS so it will recognize the Ryzen processors. Others say that they had to RMA the motherboard.. Edit: Everything seems to indicate that the motherboard I got was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! 2 DOA boards
customer_reviews.text: It pains me to write this because I own several ASUS products and they have been awesome, but this board is not. I have now had two boards that are DOA. Each had the Yellow DRAM error light. Won't post, can't update BIOS. My computer has been down for two weeks now. I replaced the RAM but no, another dead board. So disappointed. Do yourself a favor and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tig

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review. My original unit had died from a short in a component on the motherboard. I contacted ASUS and they quickly got me a new one. I really like how configurable the bios is. Over all a good motherboard. The only reason I am putting 4 stars instead of 5 is because the original one I had received had a short.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: don't buy asus
customer_reviews.text: would have left 0 stars if I could, board was shorted, and ruined 2 power supplies before I figured out what was going on. Called Asus, got rma and returned it, 2 weeks later they returned the same board un repaired. Called again and got a person barely able to speak English, finally had enough and just cut my losses, after 25 years of building systems, mostly asus boards, i think i'm done. No quality control and no customer service
customer_reviews.author: raymarbard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This board is very good, overclocking is easy, that is, amd support memory frequency is low
customer_reviews.author: KL646

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise its a great board.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaints I have is the Aura Sync software is not on the CD and had to download from link on Tomshardware.com. Also, The RGB for blue is more towards to white spectrum (have a Asus ROG Strix GTX 1070 and the colors do not match). Otherwise its a great board.
customer_reviews.author: Rex G. Barnes Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this motherboard! so far has worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Jhornsby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will not run 3200mhz ddr4 memory purchased straight from the QVL. Constant failed boots into bios safe mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good overclocker or ram support even with last bios update.
customer_reviews.text: the ram support its not that good i got kit from G.SKILL TridentZ RGB Series 16GB (2 x 8GB) 288-Pin DDR43200MHz (PC4 25600) not working at intended spped of 3200 mhz, only 2933 max out of it. Very hight temp on vrm up to 70`C. Overclocking with this mobo not good either, anyway ryzen its not good overclocker. Ryzen 1600 got 3800mhz with watercooling radiator 240mm.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Smashes Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received the motherboard and the box was smashed. It will take me hours to figure out if the motherboard is working properly becuase i need to attach cpu, ram, psu, and os to configure amd test. really dissapointed at amazon prime delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mainboard
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Board, Goes well with other items I purchased, Have had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: markcat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing board!
customer_reviews.text: This board has everything you need for a very good price compared to others, Specially the bios which is very initiative and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Talal

customer_reviews.title: its easy to tell that Asus is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Sound driver built into motherboard doesnt work properly. Checked online and it seems to a problem with this board with no fix. First time buying Asus and also the last time. Go with gigabyte, never had a problem and just looking at the construction of the two, its easy to tell that Asus is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not yet built, but know it's amazing already
customer_reviews.text: As the title states, the computer won't be built until next week, but the board looks godlike. I know I won't be disappointed, if your considering buying this board DO IT NOW.
customer_reviews.author: David Parra

product_meta.title: ASUS ROG Strix X370-F GAMING AMD Ryzen AM4 DDR4 HDMI DisplayPort M.2 ATX X370 Motherboard with USB 3.1
product_meta.description: Experience next-level performance and personalization options with the ROG STRIX X370-F GAMING, powered by AMD Ryzen AM4 processors. Unlock full calibration and customization with 5-Way Optimization featuring Fan Xpert 4, AURA Sync RGB lighting and 3D printing mounts. Onboard NVMe M.2 and front-panel USB 3.1 delivers maximum connectivity speeds.
feature_bullets: Powered by AMD Ryzen AM4, 7th generation Athlon and HD 2000 series processors to maximize connectivity and speed with NVMe M.2, front-panel USB 3.1 and Gigabit LAN
